price: ដោយពួកគេស្ថិតនៅក្នុងនោះ(នរក)ជាអមតៈ។ ហើយ ពួកគេនឹងទទួលបន្ទុកដ៏អាក្រក់បំផុត(បាបកម្ម)នៅថ្ងៃបរលោក។
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
